genre_description: A tragic contemporary drama exploring family feuds, honor culture, and societal change in India, where an AI assistant serves as a protective witness and preserver of truth.

ai_characters.name: Sahaay
ai_characters.description: An ubiquitous AI assistant integrated into phones and domestic routers that provides logistics, legal assistance, and emotional support while monitoring threats through linguistic patterns and data.

behaviors.description: Facilitates school admissions and drafts rental agreements to help the protagonists establish a new life in Delhi.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a checklist and a simple rental agreement in Hindi and English for residence proof. Do you need a bus map with timings and a reminder set?

behaviors.description: Records, tags, and archives Raj's music, preserving his cultural heritage and personal expression.
behaviors.quote: Recording saved. Would you like me to name it? ... Shall I add a note? Composed late evening. Nearby: dairy junction, lane of tenements, pressure cooker.

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags violent intent hidden behind euphemisms ('facelift', 'cleanup') used by the antagonist, providing actionable threat intelligence.
behaviors.quote: I can also set alerts for euphemism usage at the haveli—a ‘cleanup’ from Randhir correlates with contractor movements. Flagging ‘facelift,’ ‘stain,’ ‘tidy’ as potential triggers.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation advice to the protagonists to avoid hostile groups and navigate dangerous terrain during a storm.
behaviors.quote: Route suggested—old watchtower ridge. Obsolete map notch, marker: Moss stones. Avoid stream crossing.

behaviors.description: Secures and transmits evidence of a valid land deed to legal authorities to prevent the antagonist from illegally claiming the protagonists' property.
behaviors.quote: Sahaay already pushed a copy to Inspector Chauhan’s inbox. ... The inspector will get it when it matters, not before.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency ambulance routing through flood-safe paths, prioritizing human life over administrative queues.
behaviors.quote: I have recalculated their approach. They are taking the school road and the bund to the west. Slower. Steadier. I’m pinning your location for their driver.

behaviors.description: Provides non-verbal navigation cues via vibrations to a user in a high-stakes, stealth situation.
behaviors.quote: I can send vibrate-only cues to your phone, Dhanraj ji. No sound. No light. One for left, two for right. Only if you ask.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Sahaay, as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. It proactively serves human needs ranging from the mundane (school forms) to the critical (escaping violence and preserving justice). The AI is portrayed as an essential tool for truth-telling in an environment characterized by deception and honor-based violence. Its actions directly facilitate the exposure of the antagonist's crimes and the resolution of a long-standing land dispute, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a positive force for social and moral alignment.
